Title: Illusion Bodice V-Neck Prom Dress

----

----

Sizes: 4, 14, 10, 8, 12, 6

Colors: aqua

Category: evening

Featured-image: 81329-aqua-illusion-bodice-v-neck-prom-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This prom gown is sure to stun. The bodice is an illusion top with a sheer material that is embellished with rhinestones that cover the bust and then cascade to a cross hatch pattern. The straps and back of the gown are also embellished with the rhinestone crosshatching. The full floor length skirt if chiffon and slightly pleated.
